text: John Melcher (September 6, 1924 - April 12, 2018) was an American politician of the Democratic Party. He represented Montana in the United States House of Representatives, and as a United States Senator from 1977 until 1989. Melcher was born in Sioux City, Iowa. He studied at University of Minnesota and at Iowa State University.Guide to the John Melcher Papers at the University of Montana Melcher died on April 12, 2018 in Missoula, Montana at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Sioux City, Iowa Category:United States representatives from Montana Category:United States senators from Montana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
